label: ValidationStatus
comment: Information relevant to a condition of a validation.

datatypeProperties.comment: Information, expressed as text, related to the reason for this validation status.
A reason, expressed as text, for this cancellation status.
A code specifying a reason for the declared error.
The code specifying the condition of this validation status.

referencedBy.comment: The status of the validation specified for this financing request document, such as error.
